alert.note: Alert for Lower Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:08PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brewster County through 500 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Panther Junction, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Bend National Park, Terlingua Ranch Airport and Terlingua Ranch Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Texas.
